directions: In a bowl whisk together vinegar and salt and pepper to taste and whisk in oil in a stream until emulsified. Add vegetables and toss until combined well. Slaw may be made 6 hours ahead and chilled, covered.
ingredients: 1 large red bell pepper, cut into 2-inch-long strips
1 large yellow bell pepper, cut into 2-inch-long strips
2 celery ribs, cut into 2-inch-long thin strips
title: Confetti Vegetable Slaw
